name: @knennigtri/merge-markdown
description: Creates a single markdown file (with TOC) from several markdown files and optionally add html/pdf presentation
author: Kevin Nennig <nen.devpr@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run readmeTOC && npm ci && npm i --package-lock-only
scripts.m-ioTest: merge-markdown -m test/markdown/src/manifest-noIO.yml; merge-markdown -m test/markdown/src/manifest-noInput.yml; merge-markdown -m test/markdown/src/manifest-noOutput.yml
scripts.test-manifest: npm run m-extTest && npm run m-ioTest && npm run m-onlyGlobalOptions
scripts.test-other: npm run o-noManifest && npm run o-yamlTest
scripts.test-presentation: npm run p-pdfTest && npm run p-htmlTest
scripts.test-all: npm run test-manifest && npm run test-other && npm run test-presentation
